Wed, 15 Jan 2025 18:08:04 +0000 Hoiho reproduce at a low rate, with only around 20% of fledglings expected to survive to adulthood. Photo / DoC
Vandals cause $2000 worth of damage to Far North toilet blocks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/vandals-cause-2000-worth-of-damage-to-far-north-toilet-blocks/73W4RNJXMVFTFNZW5XT2GBCFPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/vandals-cause-2000-worth-of-damage-to-far-north-toilet-blocks/73W4RNJXMVFTFNZW5XT2GBCFPY/ The council is seeking the public's help after $2000 worth of damage was inflicted. Wed, 15 Jan 2025 17:00:01 +0000 This segment of graffiti, sprayed on the wall of a public Far North toilet block, was part of $2000 worth of vandalism carried out across the district recently.
Far North news in brief: Lighthouse stay popular; shot man stable and alcohol help https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-news-in-brief-lighthouse-stay-popular-shot-man-stable-and-alcohol-help/O6HC2PIHJRBMLPBI2KHHH4PQK4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-news-in-brief-lighthouse-stay-popular-shot-man-stable-and-alcohol-help/O6HC2PIHJRBMLPBI2KHHH4PQK4/News snippets from the Far North Wed, 15 Jan 2025 17:00:01 +0000 The Cape Brett historic lighthouse keeper’s cottage has been a popular place to stay since being reopened in November.
Far North under restricted fire season as district dries https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-under-restricted-fire-season-as-district-dries/LM26XJNP3BGSXFA6KWOHOZ547M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-under-restricted-fire-season-as-district-dries/LM26XJNP3BGSXFA6KWOHOZ547M/ Mike DinsdaleFar North under fire and water restrictions Wed, 15 Jan 2025 17:00:01 +0000 This large scrub fire at Waiharara in the Far North in January 2022, took firefighters 20 days to put out, at a cost of more than $10 million. With the Far North dry, a restricted fire season has been imposed on the region.

They need more volunteers to help this year.

Hope after abuse: A little girl’s new life after family disowns her https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hope-after-abuse-a-little-girls-new-life-after-family-disowns-her/K5JGEDLHUFGD3PY64CUXGL2V5M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hope-after-abuse-a-little-girls-new-life-after-family-disowns-her/K5JGEDLHUFGD3PY64CUXGL2V5M/ Hannah BartlettThe girl's mother chose to stand by her partner who was jailed for 11 years. Wed, 15 Jan 2025 17:00:00 +0000 An 11-year-old (not the person pictured) has "experienced more than anyone should in a lifetime" after she was sexually abused by her stepdad - and her family sided with him.
